attribs.risksnapshots: This plugin is known to have broken snapshots/dev builds. (risksnapshots)
attribs.java11: This plugin needs Java 11 or higher to function. (java11)
attribs.skriptwarn: Skript can be very resource intensive and it is not recommended to make big skripts. (skriptwarn)
attribs.outdated: This plugin is not maintained anymore. (outdated)
attribs.resourceintensive: This plugin is/can be very resource intensive. (resourceintensive)
attribs.poorperformance: This plugin is known to have poor performance. (poorperformance)
attribs.packetwarn: Mixed client vs server versions can sometimes cause packet-related issues. (packetwarn)
attribs.bedrock: Bedrock clients are unsupportable. Please do all debugging with a Java Edition client. (bedrock)
attribs.projectsplit: This plugin is developed in multiple locations. plshelp is checking for the latest one. (projectsplit)
attribs.requiredver-newer: This plugin needs an newer version of Minecraft to function. (requiredver)
attribs.requiredver-older: This plugin needs an older version of Minecraft to function. (requiredver)
attribs.packetwarn-old: Joining a 1.9+ server from a 1.8 client can cause serious packet-related issues. (packetwarn-old)
